attributes.action: Make employers pay extra for working during the night
attributes.additional_details:
Sleeping during the night is something we all need to function properly.  It's been proved by scientists ( prof. Matthew Walker neuroscientist of Berkley University in California)  that lack of sleep raises the chances of getting cancer up to 70%.
The link between the lack of sleep and cancer is so strong that about 3 years  WHO decided to classify ANY KIND OF night time shift work as a probable CARCINOGEN!!! 
As a night shift workers I feel like we deserve better then National Minimum Wage
attributes.background: Make employers pay extra for unsociable hours -night shifts

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about paying employees beyond the National Minimum Wage is a matter for individual employers, not the Government or House of Commons.
